alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 28 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sevier and east central McCurtain Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Broken Bow, or 22 miles west of Horatio, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... De Queen, Idabel, Broken Bow, Gillham, Eagletown, Holly Creek, Goodwater, West Line and Oak Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
